original_title: Fitz and The Tantrums: Live At The Metro
overview: Filmed over the course of three sold-out shows, Fitz and The Tantrums Live At The Metro captures the band at their boisterous best, delivering soul-shaking versions of the hits “Moneygrabber,” “Don’t Gotta Work It Out,” “L.O.V.” and other gems from their acclaimed debut album Pickin’ Up The Pieces.
title: Fitz and The Tantrums: Live At The Metro
